TPOMembrane.description: Dead loads imposed by the finish for TPO roofs. Only applicable if roof is not ballasted.

MetalDeck.description: Dead loads imposed by the weight of the roof

Misc.description: Miscellaneous loads such as sprinklers. ceiling, etc

Ballast.description: True if the building is ballasted. Typical in the North

CollateralLoad.description: Load hanging from bottom of joists

AddedSDLForSpecificBays.description: Additional SDL for specific bays. Reconmmended for office areas or additional roof equipment

DeadLoadSubtotal.description: Sum of the imposed dead loads on the building
